name: mkdocs
description: MkDocs is a static site generator designed for building documentation using Markdown. It features a live preview server, theming options, and a large plugin ecosystem, making it ideal for technical docs.
features: Markdown authoring: Write documentation in plain Markdown files organized in a simple folder structure.
Live preview: Run a development server that automatically reloads when you edit documentation files.
Theme support: Choose from Material, ReadTheDocs, and other themes or create custom designs with templates.
Plugin system: Extend functionality with plugins for search, PDF generation, diagrams, and content processing.
Navigation control: Define site structure in a YAML config file with automatic sidebar and menu generation.
Search integration: Add full-text search to documentation sites without external services using built-in indexing.
Static output: Generate fast, SEO-friendly HTML sites that can be hosted anywhere without server requirements.
GitHub Pages: Deploy documentation directly to GitHub Pages with simple configuration and automated workflows.
